detectors.description:
SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LBCOiN.sol#10-15) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-c = a / b (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LBCOiN.sol#12)
	-_assert(a == b * c + a % b) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LBCOiN.sol#13)
detectors.markdown:
[SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LBCOiN.sol#L10-L15) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[c = a / b](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LBCOiN.sol#L12)
	-[_assert(a == b * c + a % b)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LBCOiN.sol#L13)
